_header: If ever this book done take his flight
_description: A book plate of Stephen Batman — two couplets

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
ȝif euer thys booke don take his flighton Stephan batman let it
                    liȝhteȝit came to passe and yt is trweI will not change yt
                    for no newe
CamMagPep2498.Note:
Added by a sixteenth-century hand to originally blank
                    column.
CamMagPep2498.Editions:
Påhlsson,  Joel,
                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
         Lund: Ohlsson, 1911: x.
